events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of June 1st and officially filed the claim for processing.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the vehicle collision details provided by the claimant.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to this auto accident claim to assist the customer with next steps and required documentation.
The claimant received formal acknowledgement of their auto accident claim along with an outline of the claims process and expectations.
The agent requested submission of vehicle repair estimates, police accident report, and photos of the damaged car to proceed.
The claimant submitted all the requested documentation including repair quotes and the official police report for further review.
An investigation team began examining the accident circumstances, verifying documents, and assessing liability and damage extent.
The investigation concluded without dispute, confirming the collision details and validating coverage under the customer’s policy.
A fair settlement amount covering vehicle repairs and related expenses was proposed to the claimant for approval and acceptance.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt and transparent communication throughout the claims process so far.
The claim was officially approved based on full compliance with policy terms and positive outcome of the investigation.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the claimant’s designated bank account for vehicle repair costs.
Following payment issuance and customer confirmation of receipt, the auto accident claim file was formally closed.
